posts.post_title: For Sale: JACK BLISS & HEINIE HEITMULLER - Various T206s and Other Items
posts.post_content:
ALL ARE SOLD



Have the following items for sale. Prices are net to me (pp ff) - if you want to pay via Good/Services, please add 3%. $5 for shipping unless you're buying over $100 worth, then I'll cover shipping. 

Pics available if you EMAIL ME (I suck at posting pics on N54) at [url]rjustincarter@hotmail.com[/url]. 

T206 JACK BLISS - Polar Bear - SGC 3: $85 (SOLD)
T206 JACK BLISS - Polar Bear - Raw (small surface crease, prob ~PSA 2 IMO): $50 (SOLD)

E90-1 HEINIE HEITMULLER - SGC 1: $55 (SOLD)
E90-1 HEINIE HEITMULLER - Raw (no creases but paperloss back): $35 (SOLD)
E90-1 JACK BLISS - Raw (crease thru center and rough): $40 (SOLD)
